allow: Bash(docker exec confident_kapitsa bash -c "cd /workspaces/calorie-tracker && cat /tmp/zeroshot-*/logs/*.log 2>/dev/null | tail -50")
Bash(for c in confident_kapitsa upbeat_rhodes vibrant_zhukovsky tender_brattain)
Bash(do echo "=== $c ===" docker exec $c bash -c "ls /workspaces 2>/dev/null || ls /home/node 2>/dev/null")
